titleStmt.title: A short discours of the excellent doctour and knight, maister Leonardo Phiorauanti Bolognese vppon chirurgerie VVith a declaration of many thinges, necessarie to be knowne, neuer written before in this order: whervnto is added a number of notable secretes, found out by the saide author. Translated out of Italyan into English, by Iohn Hester, practicioner in the arte of distillation.
Cirugia. English
titleStmt.author: Fioravanti, Leonardo, 1518-1588.
Hester, John, d. 1593.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Leonardo Phiorauanti, vpon chyrurgerie.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
